name: Puzzle Dev
description:
This puzzle game is all about getting your game developer to the finish while cloning yourself and finding and debugging bugs.

Made By:

Ryhime: Programmer and Game Design

Ya Boy Patito: Programmer and Level Design

Sanderref: Art and Animations

Ronin Op F: Music and Sound Effects

Made in The Blackthornprod Game Jam 

Theme: Game Dev
